mapper.select: SELECT * FROM platform_menu WHERE id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM platform_permission WHERE role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM platform_user_role WHERE user_id IN ( SELECT id FROM platform_user WHERE id = ${userId} ) ) ) ORDER BY id
SELECT p1.*, p2.menu_name AS pidMenuName FROM platform_menu p1 LEFT JOIN platform_menu p2 ON p1.pid = p2.id
SELECT count(1) FROM platform_menu p1 LEFT JOIN platform_menu p2 ON p1.pid = p2.id

SELECT DISTINCT r_menu.menu_id, menu.* FROM platform_menu menu JOIN platform_role_menu r_menu ON menu.id = r_menu.menu_id JOIN platform_user_role u_role ON u_role.role_id = r_menu.role_id WHERE menu.is_menu = 1 AND u_role.user_id = 1;
